archimate:Principle.name: Sovrin Infrastructure Layers
archimate:Principle.documentation: The four layers of Sovrin Infrastructure: from bottom-to-top, the Sovrin Ledger Layer, the Agent-to-Agent Protocol Layer, the Credential Exchange Layer, and the Governance Framework Layer. See Appendix D.
